column2: "Simon Peter
column4: dze kɛma hɔn a wɔnye hɛn enya gyedzi a ɔsom bo yi bi
column5: wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn nye hɛn Agyenkwa Jesus Kraest tsenenee no mu."

column2: "Adom nka hom na asomdwee ndɔɔ so mma hom wɔ Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus ho nyimdzee mu."
"Nyankopɔn dze nankasa no tum
column3: nam nyia ɔafrɛ hɛn rokɔ noara n'enyimnyam nye yieyɛ mu no
column5: ama hɛn biribiara a yehia wɔ abrabɔ nye nyamesompa ho."

column2: "Ɔnoara do na ɔnam akyɛ hɛn n'anohoba a ɔsoso akɛse akɛse a ɔsom bo; dɛ sɛ hom enya eguan mprɔwee a ɔnam akɔndɔ do ba wɔ wiadze mu no a
column3: hom eedua iyinom do enya Nyamesu no bi."

column2: "Ampaara iyiara ntsi
column3: hom mfa mbɔdzen nyina nka ho wɔ hom afamu
column4: na hom mfa dza ɔsɔ enyi nka hom gyedzi ho; na nyimdzee nka dza ɔsɔ enyi ho;"

column2: "na enyidahɔ nka nyimdzee ho; na penkyɛr nka enyidahɔ ho;"
"na nyamesompa nka penkyɛr ho; na enuadɔ nka nyamesompa ho; na dɔ mapa nka enuadɔ ho."
"Na sɛ iyinom wɔ hom mu
column5: anaaso hɔn a wɔnnsow aba wɔ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ho nyimdzee afamu no."

column2: "Na nyia iyinom abɔ no no yɛ onyifuranyi
column4: no werɛ efir no bɔn dadaw no no nhohoree no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column4: hom mbɔ mbɔdzen mma hom frɛ na yi a woeyi hom no nsi pi: na sɛ hom yɛ yinom a

column2: "na dɛm na wɔbɛma hom kwan mbordo akɔ hɛn Ewuradze nye hɛn Agyenkwa Jesus Kraest ahendzi a onnyi ewiei no mu."
"Dɛm ntsi
column4: na hom etsim nokwar a ɔwɔ hom hɔ no mu mpo a
column5: meremma m'enyi mmpa do dɛ mebɛkaakaa hom wɔ yinom ho daa."

column2: "Na mubu no dɛ oye ara dɛ ber a metse ntamadan yi mu yi
column5: "wɔ ber minyim dɛ ɔrenkyɛr na woeyi mo ho ntamadan yi egu
column6: dɛ mbrɛ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest so eyi akyerɛ me no."

column4: na mbom yɛyɛ ho adasefo a yɛdze hɛn ankasa hɛn enyiwa hun ne kɛseyɛ."

column2: "Na onyaa enyimnyam nye enyidzi fii Egya Nyankopɔn nkyɛn ber a ndze bi fi abɔso enyimnyam no mu fiir dɛ
column3: Oyi nye mo Dɔba a ɔsɔ m'enyi no."

column3: hɛn a yɛnye no wɔ koko krɔnkrɔn no do no

column3: ɔno na sɛ hom hwɛ no yie
column4: dɛ kandzea a ɔhyerɛn beebi a ɔyɛ sunkamm dze kesi dɛ adze bɛkye
column5: na adzekyee nworaba no epue wɔ hom akoma mu a

column2: "Na hom ndzi kan nhu iyi
column3: dɛ nyimpa biara nntum no nko nnkyerɛ Kyerɛwsɛm no mu nkɔnhyɛ ase."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛ bi nnduaa nyimpa pɛ do mmbaa pɛn: na mbom Nyankopɔn nam nyimpa do kasaa dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no kyerɛɛ hɔn."
